project7

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • project7.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INode

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements INode
    This is the Node class. Each Node has an ID and might have a parent and children.
    Author:
    PC
